snippet: Stocks sank, pulling indexes further below recent closing highs. The drop was modest but broad: nine of the 10 sectors in the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index lost ground.
abstract: United States stocks sink, pulling indexes further down from record highs recorded earlier in week.
lead_paragraph: Stocks sank, pulling indexes further below recent closing highs. The drop was modest but broad: nine of the 10 sectors in the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index lost ground.

headline.main: Market Closes Lower as Investors Turn Cautious
headline.print_headline: Market Sags as Investors Remain Cautious
